---

Xeno-canto Bird Sound is a Chrome extension for quick bird sound searches based on Xeno-canto.

ğŸ” Features

- âœ… Powerful fuzzy search: Enhances the Xeno-canto website's search interface, allowing queries using any text or bird name abbreviation codes.
- âœ…  Supports advanced search syntax: For detailed instructions, please refer to [Xeno-canto search tips](https://xeno-canto.org/help/search).
- âœ…  Supports random playback: Randomly play bird sounds from specific regions.
- âœ…  Provides website links for each record: Quick links to the full Xeno-canto pages.
- âœ…  Displays spectrogram thumbnails for each entry: Faster review of each data entry.
- âœ…  Shortcut key search: Utilize shortcut keys to instantly activate the search function.

ğŸš€ Advanced Search

- grp: Group
- gen: Genus
- ssp: Subspecies
- rec: Recordist
- cnt: Country
- loc: Location
- rmk: Recordist remarks
- seen: Animals seen
- playback: Playback used
- also: Background species
- type: Predefined sound type
- sex: Sex
- stage: Life stage
- method: Recording method
- nr: XC number
- lic: Recording license
- q: Recording quality
- len: Recording length (in s)

ğŸ”– Search Example

- Quick bird search:
    - Type  RFWA in the search box
    - Select Rufous-faced Warbler from the dropdown menu
- Locate recordings from Taiwan:
    - After selecting the bird, add  loc:taiwan to your search
    - Example: `"Abroscopus albogularis" loc:taiwan`
- Find high-quality Taiwan recordings:
    - To filter for top-quality recordings, add  q:A to your search
    - Full example: `"Abroscopus albogularis" loc:taiwan q:A`
- Pro tip: Combine search terms for more specific results. For instance:
    - `"Abroscopus albogularis" loc:taiwan q:A type:song` to find high-quality song recordings from Taiwan
